model

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    A class describing a playing-card. The class is used to construct playing-cards.
    Author:
    Åke Ekmark, Andreas Wieselqvist och Simon Söderhäll.
